sentences: Frank-Martin Strauß, better known as F.M. Einheit and also known as Mufti, (born 18 December 1958, in Dortmund) is an industrial and electronic musician and actor from Germany.
In 1988–9 he was part of Alfred 23 Harth's group Vladimir Estragon.
In the 1990s he was also a member of a band Stein, also featuring Ulrike Haage and Katharina Franck from the band Rainbirds.
One of his major projects after Einstürzende Neubauten was the band Gry with a female singer Gry Bagøien from Denmark.
They released two albums: The Touch Of E! (1998) and Public Recording (2000, featuring Pan Sonic and Neubauten's Alexander Hacke).
2006 Echohce (FM Einheit/Jamie Lidell/David Link/Saskia v. Klitzing/Volker Kamp)
2011 Spielwiese 3 (Hans Joachim Irmler/FM Einheit/Ute Marie Paul/Katie Young)
1997 Der Platz, directed by Uli M Schueppel
1997 Im Platz, directed by Uli M Schueppel
2008 Der Tag, directed by Uli M Schueppel
2009 Die Narbe, Westberlin (West), directed by Burkhard von Harder
